column3: News;Banteay Meanchey------:------ (Post News) Officials have said that there was a fatality at the construction project for the upgrade of National Road 5.------This happened on the 14th of November
column4: 2018 on National Road 5.------Police said that the victim’s name was Vann Chik
column8: Mongkul Borei district.------The victim was urinating at the side of the road and the driver of the heavy roller machine did not see her.------After the incident
column9: the cops gave the body to relatives for traditional festivals.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/387043
